text: usane aakaashon ko paida kiya, (jo thamen hue hain) bina aise stambhon ke jo tumhen dikhaee den. aur usane dharatee mein pahaad daal die ki aisa na ho ki tumhen lekar daanvaadol ho jae aur usane usamen har prakaar ke jaanavar phaila die. aur hamane hee aakaash se paanee utaara, phir usamen har prakaar kee uttam cheeze ugaee
